tool_description:
Provides information about countries. 

You can get the list of all countries or you can search country by iso code.
name: Countries API
title: Countries API

api_list.name: /countries/iso
/countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
